tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: An empty tavern, you can go outside via a door to your south, or up, there is a table and two mugs

interactions.examine: It's an empty tavern, you can go outside via a door to your south, or up, there is a table [[imug01:taken:false==with a green mug]] [[imug02:taken:false==and a red mug]]

bedroom.name: Bedroom
bedroom.description: An empty bedroom, there is a bed, a stairwell behind a door leads down

interactions.examine: An empty bedroom, there is a bed, a stairwell leads down

lookable.door: leads to a hallway with a staircase to the tavern

outside.name: Outside
outside.description: It is dark, there is a tavern to your north[[routside:moon:true==, the moon is out]]
